shopping-list works!

Enter the recipe name

Enter descrpition

Upload the recipe Image

id name ingredients descrpition Image image path
{{ nm.id }} {{ nm.name1 }} {{nm.ingredients}} {{ nm.desc1 }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ListService } from '../list.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-shopping-list', templateUrl: './shopping-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./shopping-list.component.css'] }) export class ShoppingListComponent implements OnInit{ public url: any; selectFile(event: any) { var reader = new FileReader(); reader.readAsDataURL(event.target.files[0]); reader.onload = (_event) => { this.url = reader.result; } } public name:any; public ingredient:any; public desc:any; public recipelist:any=[]; public itemlist:any=[]; constructor(private recipeservice:ListService){} getlistservice(){ this.recipeservice.name=this.name; this.recipeservice.ingredient=this.ingredient; this.recipeservice.description=this.desc; this.recipeservice.url=this.url; this.recipelist=this.recipeservice.add(); this.itemlist=this.recipeservice.list; } display(){ this.itemlist=this.recipeservice.list; console.log("this.itemlist = ",this.itemlist) } ngOnInit(): void { this.getlistservice() } }
